quest.name: Little Sylphs Lost
journal: Gavin would enlist the services of a willing-and-able adventurer─to wit, you.

As Lieutenant Gavin tells it, the Order of the Twin Adder received a panicked missive from Voyce, the naturalist who has taken up residence in Little Solace. Travel to the sylph settlement and see what has the hapless scholar in such distress.

Voyce and Elder Frixio relate to you the plight faced by the sylphs─a mass kidnapping of podlings that had been resting safely in Little Solace. Convinced that the touched sylphs that inhabit the Sylphlands are responsible for the deed, Voyce begs you to travel to the entrance to their lair in the East Shroud, and stand lookout in hopes of catching the abductor in the act.

Your search turned up not the culprits you sought, but rather a mysterious young girl who ominously suggests that the truth behind the disappearance of the podlings is far more fearsome than you suspected, before hastening off to destinations unknown. Return to Voyce and inform him that you will have to look elsewhere for the kidnapper.

In hearing that the touched sylphs are not behind the kidnapping, Voyce is visibly perplexed. Who could have perpetrated this terrible crime, and to what end? This mystery warrants further investigation.
objectives: Speak with Voyce at Little Solace.
Keep lookout at the entrance to the Sylphlands.

dialogue.name: GAVIN
dialogue.text: Your zeal is most appreciated, friend[GC Rank]. Allow me to delve straight into the matter at hand.

dialogue.name: GAVIN
dialogue.text: We have received a most disturbing report from our contact in Little Solace, the esteemed scholar of sylphic mysteries by the name of Voyce.

dialogue.name: GAVIN
dialogue.text: I could not make much sense of his missive─I daresay I have seen chocobos with better quillmanship─but it would appear that recent events have struck the fear of the gods into the man.

dialogue.name: GAVIN
dialogue.text: What few sentences I could decipher specifically asked us to contact the Maelstrom and send for yousend youcontact the Immortal Flames and send for you, Forename[GC Rank]. It would seem that Master Voyce was quite taken with your prior efforts on his behalf.

dialogue.name: GAVIN
dialogue.text: What few sentences I could decipher specifically asked us to contact the Maelstrom and send for yousend youcontact the Immortal Flames and send for you, Forename[GC Rank]. It would seem that Master Voyce was quite taken with your prior efforts on his behalf.

dialogue.name: GAVIN
dialogue.text: It need not be said that any threat facing our sylph friends is potentially a threat to Gridania, as well. Pray make for Little Solace and look into the matter that concerns Master Voyce so.

dialogue.name: GAVIN
dialogue.text: It need not be said that any threat facing our sylph friends is potentially a threat to Gridania, as well. Pray make for Little Solace and look into the matter that concerns Master Voyce so.

dialogue.name: VOYCE
dialogue.text: Wh-What's this!? My copy of A Brief Historie of the Twelveswood has been replaced by a tome detailing two hundred and forty varieties of beastkin feces!

dialogue.name: VOYCE
dialogue.text: Wh-Why, Forename! Whatever are you doing here!? I sent for you? Now that you mention it, perhaps I did! Ahahahahaha!

dialogue.name: VOYCE
dialogue.text: What is the matter? What is the matter, you say!? A veritable peck of podlings, pilfered from Little Solace while I was taking...ah, a brief respite from my research.

dialogue.name: VOYCE
dialogue.text: You must help me, friend! Why, were Elder Frixio to find out that this happened under my watch─

dialogue.name: FRIXIO
dialogue.text: (-???-)...This one would be entirely unsurprised.

dialogue.name: FRIXIO
dialogue.text: This one is heartened by brave one's presence. If there is one thing that can be said for bumbling one, it is that bumbling one has strong and trustworthy friends.

dialogue.name: FRIXIO
dialogue.text: This one fears it is exactly as bumbling one says. Little ones that these ones had raised with care...little ones soon to sprout to life, gone! Every last one...

dialogue.name: VOYCE
dialogue.text: As you well know, friend, podlings are young sylphs in their pre-birth state. Why, this is no mere act of theft, but sylph-napping on an unprecedented scale!

dialogue.name: FRIXIO
dialogue.text: Little ones are the future. Without little ones, there will be no one to carry on these ones' vision of peace.

dialogue.name: VOYCE
dialogue.text: The touched ones are behind this, no doubt! Having failed to capture the Chosen One, now they would rear an entire generation of hate-filled, treacherous sylphs! We must stop them!

dialogue.name: VOYCE
dialogue.text: And by we, I mean brave Forename here! You will venture to the Sylphlands and rescue the little ones from the hands of their would-be kidnappers, yes? Yes, you must!

dialogue.name: VOYCE
dialogue.text: Forename! You must hurry to the Sylphlands and catch the touched ones in their vile act. Not for me, my friend─for the little ones!

dialogue.name: FRIXIO
dialogue.text: It pains this one's heart to burden brave one once more, but these ones have nowhere else to turn. Please, brave one, deliver little ones to safety.

dialogue.name: SILVIA
dialogue.text: (-???-)SheHe looks, but does shehe see?

dialogue.name: SILVIA
dialogue.text: (-Mysterious Girl-)No, shehe does not. Otherwise, shehe would not be looking where shehe is looking.

dialogue.name: SILVIA
dialogue.text: (-Mysterious Girl-)That which you seek will not be found here. For this is not the idle mischief of malevolent sylphs. Oh, no─this is but the prelude to a dark and dastardly plot that threatens to shake Eorzea to its very core.

dialogue.name: SILVIA
dialogue.text: (-Mysterious Girl-)My name? You could call me Sylvie.

dialogue.name: SILVIA
dialogue.text: But you will have no occasion to do so. For I shall pursue our kidnapper, and you shall return and see to your own concerns. That is, if you know what's good for you...

dialogue.name: SILVIA
dialogue.text: Farewell, friend. Our paths will not cross again. I must...hurry...yes, hurry to La Noscea...before tragedy strikes again...

dialogue.name: FRIXIO
dialogue.text: Brave one returns, but little ones are nowhere to be seen... Were these ones too late to─hmmm? It is not touched ones, brave one says?

dialogue.name: FRIXIO
dialogue.text: A green-haired walking one? Dark plots? Brave one's words concern this one, yet this one holds out hope that little ones may yet be saved...

dialogue.name: VOYCE
dialogue.text: Ah, there you are, friend! I trust that you gave those nasty sylphs their due and returned the little ones to safety?

dialogue.name: VOYCE
dialogue.text: What's that, you say? It was not the touched ones that did the deed, and 'twas a mysterious green-haired maiden that shared this knowledge with you!?

dialogue.name: VOYCE
dialogue.text: Wh-Whoever could be behind this unconscionable crime!? Perhaps the answer lies in one of my tomes...

dialogue.name: VOYCE
dialogue.text: “On the medicinal properties of goobbue feces...” Oh, this won't do at all. Woe, woe is me!
